dict.acceptation: 特权；（因财富和社会地位而仅有部分人享有的）权益；免责特权；特殊荣幸；

sent.orig: ALRC Report 107: Privilege in Perspective Client Legal Privilege in Federal Investigations.
sent.trans: 澳大利亚法律改革委员会107报告：透视客户立法权利，联邦调查的立法权利。

sent.orig: Privilege Management Infrastructure (PMI) maps user identity to privilege using attribute certificate.
sent.trans: 授权管理基础设施(PMI)利用属性证书提供用户身份到应用授权的映射功能。

sent.orig: Abuse or misuse of your sick leave privilege will not be tolerated by the firm.
sent.trans: 事务所不容许滥用病假权的行为。

sent.orig: Fudge is somewhat weak, swayed by money and addicted to his own position and privilege.
sent.trans: 福吉看起来有几分软弱，喜欢钱，迷恋地位和权利。

sent.orig: That's how the family haughtily enjoyed utmost privilege in Romania saw its demise.
sent.trans: 原本在罗国不可一世享尽特权的家族，竟是如此下场。
